titles.title: Terrorist Rewards Enhancement Act of 2009

To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to permit eligibility in certain circumstances for an officer or employee of a foreign government to receive a reward under the Department of State Rewards Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Introduced. Terrorist Rewards Enhancement Act of 2009 - Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to permit eligibility in certain circumstances for an officer or employee of a foreign government to receive a reward under the Department of State Rewards Program.
